description.value:
You can work with an ally to place your foes off-balance.

Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.11cfGGiQ9oTi4f9G]{Improved Feint}

Benefit: When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.GcVVfpQ79HdcMqBt#feint]{feint} an enemy, choose an ally who’s threatening that enemy. In addition to being @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{flat-footed} for your next attack made before the end of your next turn, the enemy is also flat-footed for that ally’s next attack made against them before the end of the ally’s next turn.

Teamwork Benefit: If an ally who also has this feat threatens the enemy you’re attempting to feint, you can roll twice on the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.GcVVfpQ79HdcMqBt]{Bluff} check and take the better result.
